name: The PlayTester (Demo)
description:
Your a game tester looking to make some money. Luckily a developer contacts you and send you a build of his new game. You enter the game and you see somethings wrong. The game has alot of glitches and it looks like a horror game. Your goal is to find all the glitches and escape.  Warning this it a demo so there will be alot of glitches, bugs, and short gameplay. 
#horror #retro #adventure #action #maze
